author: unknown
message:
PR #31550: [DOC] operation_semantics HLO specifications update

Imported from GitHub PR https://github.com/openxla/xla/pull/31550

## Summary of Changes

- Major Changes
  - Ops have been arranged alphabetically in line with StableHLO.
  - Element-wise unary functions, Element-wise binary arithmetic operations, Element wise comparison operations sections have been removed
    - Ops in these sections have been given their own heading with supporting semantics for each
  - Many new Ops inline with hlo_opcode.h have been added with supporting semantics
  - Most Ops' sections have been updates with:
    - Added link to StableHLO variant (if exists) or note for each op when no stableHLO Op is listed
    - Added/updated link XlaBuilder.h or hlo_instructions.h to each

- Minor Changes
  - Many minor spacing, newlines, arrangements, and formatting updates
  - Many updates to spelling/syntax
  - Table formatting has been updated for consistency
  - Removed HTML tags
